imageCitation: Photo by Ada Chai from McGraw Studio

instructions.2: Crack all eggs into a bowl and mix with sesame oil and soy sauce.
instructions.3: Preheat the wok over medium heat. Add eggs and scramble. Then take out and set aside.
instructions.4: Add in your tomatoes and sugar. Stir fry for 2 minutes.
instructions.5: Add eggs back into the wok and stir fry together.
instructions.6: Transfer into a serving dish and serve.

tips: Adjust sugar and soy sauce as needed.

imageCitation: Photo by RODNAE Productions from Pexels

instructions.Detail: In a pot, bring water to boil. Cook ramen noodles
In another pot, add miso and chicken booth, bring it to a simmer
When noodles are done, serve them into a bowl, add the ramen soup prepared in step 2

imageCitation: Photo by Janine Beth Salazar from Pexels

instructions.Detail: Cut chicken into 1 inch cubes
Marinate chicken pieces in a mixture of cornstarch, soy sauce, baking soda and Shaoxing wine for at least 20 minutes
Heat a pan over high heat. Add 2 tablespoons of cooking oil, allow to heat up, then add marinated chicken.
Quickly fry chicken in hot oil for 3-4 minutes until edges are browned.
Put all ingredients (except for ramen, rice cakes, and cheese) in a pot. Add the sauce in the middle
Boil it on medium high heat until the stock starts to boil
Add the remaining ingredients on top the pot and boil until the noodles are fully cooked

imageCitation: Photo by Monica Turlui from Pexels

instructions.Detail: Cook pasta in a large pot of boiling slated water
Add butter, garlic in a saucepan over medium heat, cook until the butter turns a golden brown
Stir the pasta and Parmesan until wll combined
Mix the salt, soy sauce, wine, and five spice powder in a small bowl and massage into the duck. Marinate for at least 30 minutes
Heat an oven-proof pan over medium-high heat, and add 1 tablespoon of oil
Sear the duck breasts, skin side down, for 6-8 minutes.

when the duck skin is a bit crispy and dark golden brown, carefully drain off the duck fat and discard (or save for later application to other recipes!). Flip the duck breasts (so they are skin side up), and transfer them to the broiler for about 3 minutes.
Remove the duck from the broiler and let rest for 10 to 15 minutes.
Cut the duck into thin slices. Serve the duck with your warmed pancakes, fixings, and sauce.

imageCitation: Photo by Xuanhui Chen from McGraw Studio

instructions.Detail: Brush both sides of steak with olive oil with seasalt and grounded black pepper, and massage the steak. Marinate for at least 15 minutes.
Heat the non-stick pan until super hot.
Add the steak and sear the it on the first side for 2 minutes until a brown crust has formed then flip and cook another 2 minutes.
Using tongs, turn the steak on its sides to sear the edges (30 seconds per edge).
Reduce heat to medium and add butter, garlic cloves and rosemary to the pan. Continue spooning the sauce over the steak for 5 minutes and add cherry tomatoes at the last minute.
Transfer steak to the plate, and then add A5 sauce to it.

imageCitation: Photo by Xuanhui Chen from McGraw Studio

instructions.Detail: Use a scissor to cut lobster shell from the top and leave the end uncut. Carefully dragged the lobster meat out and put it on the top of the lobster shell.
Melt unsalted butter and mix with chopped garlic. Brush the lobster meat with it.
Add parsley flake and black pepper on it. Then add cheddar and mozzarella cheese mix on top of it.
Heat the oven to 190 Celsius degree/375 Fahrenheit degree and set the timer for 15 minutes. Put the lobster tail on the baking tray and send it into the oven.
Use oven glove to grab the baking tray out and transfer lobster on the plate.

imageCitation: Photo by Xuanhui Chen from McGraw Studio

instructions.Detail: Wash chicken wings and cut three strokes on both sides of every chicken wings.
Put chicken wings and chopped ginger into the boiling pot. Add 600 ml water and shaoxing wine, and heat water until it boils. Wash chicken wings after remove them from the pot.
Add oil into the pan and fry both sides of the chicken wings with medium heat until golden brown.
Add soy sauce and dark soysauce into the pan. Stir for 1 minute and poor coke into the pan.
Cover the pot with the pot lid and wait for 10 minutes. Remove the lid and turn to high heat. Cook until the sauce becomes sticky.
Put chicken wings on a plate and add seasame on top of them.

imageCitation: Photo by Xuanhui Chen from McGraw Studio

instructions.Detail: Wash okra. Pour water into the pot, wait until it boils, and then put okra into the pot. Cook for 3 minutes.
Put okra into cold water and wait until it cools down. Cut each piece of okra into quarter.
Mix Chinese pepper flakes, chopped garlic into a bowl. Heat oil and pour into the bowl. Add soy sauce and vinegar into the bowl
Put cutted okra into a bowl and pour in the mixed sauce.
Put the okra into the refrigerator and wait until it becomes cold.

imageCitation: Photo by Xuanhui Chen from McGraw Studio

instructions.Detail: Mix Shaoxing wine, soy sauce, corn starch, oil, 1/2 teaspoon of black pepper flakes, egg with the beef stew. Wait for 15 minutes.
Add oil and garlic into the pan, fry until golden brown
Add beef stew into the pan and stir fry with medium heat until golden brown. Remove beef stew from pan.
Reduce heat and add unsalted butter into the pan. Add garlic and beef stew. Stir fry for 5 minutes.
Add sugar and 1 tea spoon of black pepper flakes. Stir fry for 30 seconds.
